entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Blazor] JS assets in `Microsoft.AspNetCore.Components.CustomElements` are not getting included #60859
  • Perf improvement: fortunes, mTls-handshakes-kestrel #60855
  • Can't build BasicTestApp #60849
  • [Blazor] Can't register custom AuthenticationStateProvider when already using EntraID auth. #60848
  • [Blazor] Support `@key` at the render boundary level for declarative persistent component state #60844
    .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Ensure caches are cleared on hot reload for declarative persistent component state #60843
    .NET 10 Planning
  • ChainedPartitionedRateLimiter double-counts when internal limiter uses queue #60852
  • Auto Column feature for QuickGrid #60842
  • Perf regression: https #60841
  • [Blazor] Static SSR - [SupplyParameterFromForm] parameter null on empty form data (eg. unchecked InputCheckbox) #60837

Closed

  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] with IFormFileCollection in .NET 8 Minimal APIs #56114
  • Perf regression: fortunes, single_query #60834
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_dapper #60840
  • Refactoring DiagnosticDescriptors.cs files #60831
  • POST /_blazor/negotiate returns 411 LengthRequired #60733
  • Perf improvement: json, json_middleware #60828
  • TypeScript SignalR client (@microsoft/signalr) automatic reconnection sometimes not working #56260

PullRequests

Created

  • Add SignalR client log for stream item binding failure #60857
    area-signalr
  • JSInterop: Enable returning null for a nullable value type #60850
    area-blazor, community-contribution

Merged

  • Descriptive Error for Improper Use of [AsParameters] #58218
    community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, area-minimal, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix punctuation of documentation in AuthenticationHandler.cs #60814
    community-contribution, area-security, 10.0-preview3
  • Update Playwright version in Versions.props #60854
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Add doc link for policybot #60856
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Fix OpenAPI server URLs for Aspire scenarios #60673
    Servicing-approved, area-mvc, feature-openapi, area-minimal, 9.0.4
  • [release/9.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e235eb3` to `24a9e94` #60678
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 9.0.4
  • [release/8.0] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `e235eb3` to `24a9e94` #60677
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, 8.0.15
  • Deduplicate assets produced on multiple build legs in the VMR to only be produced on the 'primary' build leg #60792
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • Update milestones for April #60853
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview3
  • [Blazor] Flow the WebAssembly options from Server to client through SSR marker #60714
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview3
  • Refactoring DiagnosticDescriptors.cs files #60832
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 10.0-preview3

Updated

  • Support input validation for minimal APIs via generic resolver model #60724
    area-minimal
  • Update project templates use primary constructors and collection expressions #59712
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Add Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi to the webapiaot template (with an optional flag to disable it) #60337
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Setting the Description in a ProducesResponseTypeAttribute works correctly for Minimal API #60539
    area-mvc, community-contribution
  • Make default stack size to be 1 MB in base16 #60811
    community-contribution, area-networking
  • perf: improve ManagedAuthenticatedEncryptor Decrypt() and Encrypt() flow #59424
    area-dataprotection, pending-ci-rerun
  • [Blazor] Initial support for persisting component state #60634
    area-blazor
  • Add `NotFound` method in `NavigationManager` for interactive and static rendering #60752
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • Fixes dictionary binding error for numeric key/value #59911
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pr: pending author input
  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.3.25122.1 #60564
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:, 10.0-preview3
  • [Blazor] Opt-in to use dotnet.boot.js #60751
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview3

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Extensions: adjust rules for `[Extension]` attribute #9205

Merged

  • Extensions: track more open issues #9201

Updated

  • Field nullability revisions #9184
  • Revamp proposal for list patterns on enumerables #9165

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • DbContext.Entry().Reference().Load() falsely tracks existing reference entity as Added #35762
  • Setting the password for an encrypted database fails, if version 3.48.0 or higher of the underlying SQLite library is used #35760
  • Compiled query unable to translate Where with long? #35758
  • Redact inlined constants from log when sensitive logging is off #35757
    10.0.0
  • SET READ_COMMITTED_SNAPSHOT ON by default #35756

Closed

  • The problem of loading extra data when using the DDD approach #35761

PullRequests

Updated

  • Fix to #21006 - Support a default value for non-nullable properties #35746
  • Depend on Microsoft.CodeAnalysis 4.13.0 #35753
  • Redact constants that get inlined from variables into query in log #35724
  • Navigation test refactoring - improving structure for scenarios that don't support collections #35711

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TitleView inside a NavigationPage has a top margin when page has UseSafeArea="False" #28293
  • Catalyst Device Tests are broken from [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28285
    .NET 9 SR5
  • CollectionView RemainingItemsThresholdReachedCommand fires on initial data load #28279
  • Both methods have similar logic for creating an InMemoryRandomAccessStream, could we refactor it creating a helper method? #28274
    .NET 10 Planning
  • Getting exception while adding more views for scroll view. #28266
  • CollectionView inside invisible StackLayout doesn't show on iOS #28263

Closed

  • Re-enable PushingNavigationPageModallyWithShellShowsToolbarCorrectly test (flaky) on Catalyst #28271
    Backlog
  • [testing] Unit tests failing on main #28275
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Image is not loading in RadioButton (RadioButton.Content) in .NET Maui for .NET 9 SDK #28253
  • Blank target links no longer works on iOS 18 in BlazorWebView #25602
    .NET 9 SR6
  • CollectionView on Tabbed Page crashes on Android #27844
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Build is failing when it doest find Simulator #28227
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • AppCompatEditText#Background#SetTint affects other instances #28247
    Backlog
  • CollectionView footer disappear unexpectedly #17437
  • [Bug][Android]The IsEnable property of the Picker does not work #18035
  • Double border in MacOS and iOS #20556
  • ScrollView Orientation="Horizontal" RTL ios ​​not working In .NET 8 Maui #18883
  • HybridWebView crashing every time in Windows now with 9.0.40 update #27953
    .NET 9 SR5
  • [Bug] iOS: On-Demand Resource Tag not available to be set #28260
  • Returning back from navigation to My Recipes page would result in a blank screen. #28098
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Keyboard Overlay Issue: Input Fields Hidden Behind Native Keyboard in Hybrid WebView App #28083
  • Performance of navigation between two pages in a MAUI Shell app is really very poor. Taking more than 4-5 secs to navigate to a page #19605
  • No ProcessTerminated on iOS when WebView dies and turns blank #28088

PullRequests

Created

  • [net10.0] Remove mobile librarybuilder net9 #28290
    area-infrastructure, dependencies, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [HybridWebView] Always complete web requests #28286
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix NullReferenceException in PaintExtensions.IsSolid on Android (#28116) #28284
    .NET 9 SR4.1
  • Fix SafeArea management on iOS #28283
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • Refactored similar methods on Windows HybridWebView #28282
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-controls-hybridwebview
  • [Android] TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage does not fit all screen - 2 #28281
    platform/android 🤖, area-navigation, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨, area-controls-flyout
  • [Windows] Fix for Label Not Vertically Centered with MinimumHeightRequest #28270
    platform/windows 🪟, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Fix for flaky UITests in CI that occasionally fail - 5 #28269
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion, .NET 9 SR5

Merged

  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Update preview2 ios android sdk #28287
  • Add attempt number to failed builds #28280
    .NET 9 SR5
  • Fix incorrect MAC Image #28265
    area-testing
  • Patch in a temporary location #28278
  • Remove pending TODOs in .NET10 #28267
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Replace deprecated iOS OpenUrl #28160
    area-blazor, .NET 9 SR6
  • Don't throw on cleanup for CI with template tests #28248
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] [net10.0] Move iOS 18.0 simulators #28277
  • [net10.0] Move iOS 18.0 simulators #28273
    area-testing, testing-infrastructure, testing-green-ci, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview2] Update with final preview2 versions #28231
    area-infrastructure, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [HybridWebView] Properly managed response streams #28230
    area-blazor, p/0, .NET 9 SR5
  • Update MauiPreviousDotNetReleasedVersion to 9.0.14 #28251
  • [Revert] [iOS] CollectionView with grouped data crashes on iOS when the groups change - fix #28246
    platform/iOS 🍎, p/0, area-controls-collectionview, .NET 9 SR5

Updated

  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #28203
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-infrastructure
  • WebView2CompositionControl support for BlazorWebView #28063 #28104
    area-blazor, community ✨
  • [HybridWebView] Refactor and convert the HybridWebView.js file into a TypeScript file #27183
    area-controls-hybridwebview
  • Visual state change for disabled RadioButton #23471
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton
  • [iOS] Setting background color on the Searchbar - fix #23355
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • Fixed the picker title's color #23075
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Remove PlatformWrapperView.java setHasShadow #28245
    t/breaking 💥, platform/android 🤖, area-drawing, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Custom shell back button color #22940
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨
  • [.Net10] Make IsVisibleCore and RefreshIsVisibleProperty visible #28139
    t/breaking 💥, area-architecture, community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Make GraphicsViewHandler.MapBackground public #28243
    t/breaking 💥, area-drawing, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • Fix/workaround iOS stuck device tests #28196
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-testing, community ✨, .NET 9 SR5
  • Improve iOS CollectionView performance by leveraging the new platform level invalidation mechanism #28225
    p/0, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, t/perf, collectionview-cv2, .NET 9 SR6
  • fix-27998 - [Windows] ScrollView is not scrolling to the bottom if in grid with *,auto Width #28258
    platform/windows 🪟, area-layout, community ✨, layout-grid, area-controls-scrollview
  • Make HybridWebViewHandler throw JS exceptions in C# by default #28086
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 5 #28193
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 2 #28058
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [net10.0] Enable trimmer warnings #28015
    t/app-size, .NET 10.0-preview2
  • [NET10.0] Annotate `ListStringTypeConverter` for nullability #28244
    community ✨, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [net10.0] Update net10.0 preview3 #28228
    .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] Image is not loading in RadioButton - fix #28254
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-radiobutton, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • Picker Attribute "SelectedIndex" Not being respected on page load - fix #22353
    platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker
  • Fix for Try scrolling down and when new items are added the first item does not kept in the displayed list. #27153
    platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Picker Selected item gets cleared in BindableLayout - Fix #26777
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-picker, .NET 9 SR6
  • Skip useless handler mappings calls while connecting #27259
    community ✨, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Improvement] Add ReturnType API for SearchBar #24906
    t/enhancement ☀️, community ✨, area-controls-searchbar, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Android] TabbedPage in FlyoutPage in navigationPage does not fit all screen #22836
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-tabbedpage, community ✨
  • Fixed ScrollView inside a Grid expands width past device screen when Rotated #27839
    community ✨, area-controls-scrollview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix ImageButton Padding the third #25223
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-button, partner/syncfusion/review, .NET 9 SR6
  • [Android] DatePicker not respecting UserAppTheme - fix #28256
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-datetimepicker
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 3 #28103
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Label Visibility Issue on macOS and iOS #28081
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Moved ImageDoesNotLeak test case from Device Test to UI Test #28223
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [NET10.0] Fix parameter name for `ScrollViewerExtensions.UpdateScrollBarVisibility` #28255
    community ✨
  • Fixed - Grouped CollectionView items not rendered properly on Android, works on Windows #27847
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fixed the OneWayBinding issue with MultiBindingConverter on Slider and Stepper Value #28219

  • Fixed the Label not sized correctly on Android #28215
    platform/android 🤖, community ✨, area-controls-label, partner/syncfusion
  • [Testing] Enabling more UI Tests by removing platform specific condition - 19 #28060
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSharpScript.EvaluateAsync: Returns `null` when C# code ends with trailing semicolon #77512
  • GetDeclaredSymbol does not return an appropriate IParameterSymbol on a modern extension ParameterSyntax. #77502
  • The VS Stack Trace Explorer cannot resolve .razor files #77499
  • When the warning is long I can't see the end of it in the bottom bar of Visual Studio #77497
  • Run Code Analysis continues to be broken #77495
  • I have to fight against the "dot to insert empty arglist" autocompletion feature to use nested class inheritance-based C# unions #77480

Closed

  • Revert WPF work around when we merge RC1 SDK #74923
    17.13
  • JsonSerializerOptions is not accepted for JsonSerializer.Deserialize #77474

PullRequests

Created

  • Results of running 'use null propagation' #77513
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, VSCode
  • On-the-fly-docs Pass along additional context #77510
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Clean up implementation of SourceMethodSymbol.AddSynthesizedAttributes after merge from 'main' #77509
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77508
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add more modern-extension FAR tests #77503
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix run code analysis on solution not reporting results #77501
    Area-Analyzers, untriaged, VSCode
  • Show analysis status in task status center instead of status bar #77496
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [Personal Review Only] Prototype/field nullability 3 #77491
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove CurrentManagedThreadId deoptimization from yield codegen #77478
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions

Merged

  • Remove workaround of WPF bug #77462
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Update nav-bar to support modern extensions #77504
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77507
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not offer 'extract interface' on an extension type #77506
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Do not offer 'convert to regular constructor' on an extension type #77505
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Merge 'main' into extensions #77487
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Update navigate-to to support modern extensions #77498
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Add quick info tests for extensions #77492
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77493
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77494
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Add 'find-refs' tests for extensions #77490
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add 'go to def' tests for extensions #77489
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix formatting of new extensions #77488
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'main-vs-deps' #77486
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev18.0' #77485
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Rename flyout] Fixed cropping issue on small screens #77466
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Next
  • Remove unnecessary imports #77481
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Update 'use conditional expr' to support null-conditional-assignment #77484
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update generate-variable to understand null-conditional-assignment #77482
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Update 'use null prop' to support null-conditional-assignment #77483
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Use original names for extension implementation methods #77455
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Use GetIsNewExtensionMember helper in more places #77461
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Update dev18 target branch #77443
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Fix Stack Trace Explorer for additional documents #77517
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make ISemanticSearchCopilotUIProvider import lazy to avoid loading VS.EA.Copilot #77516
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable downloading the runtime packages during restore and instead ensure that it happens when needed (pack) #77515
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement field null resilience analysis #77127
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Adds :bulb: `Implement Using Copilot` for `NotImplementedException` #77299
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Extensions: resolve new members like classic extension methods #77423
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [WIP] Merge RoslynAnalyzers into Roslyn #77178
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review
  • WIP: Remove source generator diagnostic reporting from Workspace #76863
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Support IsActiveDocument in RoslynCodeSearchResult #77311
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make partial interface members virtual #77379
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add stubs for semantic model apis needed by IDE #77448
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • openSUSE Tumbleweed - nothing provides 'libopenssl1_0_0' #113346
  • Officially document and update the `DEFAULT_STACK_SIZE` app property #113344
    Future
  • MemoryCache has a Finalizer #113340
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'node->IsUnusedValue() && "found an unmarked unused value"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #113338
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isGeneralRegister(reg2)' during 'Generate code' #113337
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'use != nullptr' during 'Clone blocks with range checks' #113334
    10.0.0
  • Backporting deadlock fixes in Microsoft.Win32.SystemEvents to LTS #113332
  • [9.0] MemoryCacheTest.Trim(String throwOnDisposed=true) failure - assert values differ #113331
  • [infra][iOS][tvOS] Update Apple mobile OS versions used for CI testing to 18.x #113325
    10.0.0
  • System.ThreadPool.GetAvailableThreads always returns maxIoCompletionThreads instead of available IO Completion Threads #113322
  • JIT: Bad result on arm32 #113321
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Bad result with modulo on linux-arm64 #113320
    10.0.0
  • Could not load file or assembly 'System.Security.Principal.Windows, Version=4.1.1.0 #113319
  • ARM32 SIMD / NEON instruction set support #113317
  • WebSocket client on Blazor Wasm on .NET 8 does not abort when disposed. #113311
  • Test failure: JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256_1/Vector256_1_r/Vector256_1_r.cmd #113308

Closed

  • OpenSSL stores refreshing blocks multiple threads causing lock contention and thread pool exhaustion. #113227
    8.0.x
  • [Feature Proposal] AOT universal shared generics #113038
  • Test failure: Interop/COM/NativeClients/Dispatch/Dispatch.cmd #112772
  • [browser] Change default boot.json name #109876
    Future
  • Arm64 SVE: Use mask versions of instructions where possible. #103078
    10.0.0
  • LdapConnection causes an NullReferenceException when authenticating with Authentication type external and a client certificate #113154
    10.0.0
  • Add String.Replace() method overloads to accept String Arrays #40407
  • Array.IndexOf option to use IComparable #40410
  • Is/should there a code-style for avoiding null on left side of a binary expression? #40561
  • Outdated instructions in runtime/pr-guide.md #41068

PullRequests

Created

  • Don't update side-effects in a statement that doesn't exist #113351
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [manual] Merge release/9.0-staging into release/9.0 #113350
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • [manual] Merge release/8.0-staging into release/8.0 #113349
    Servicing-approved, new-api-needs-documentation, area-codeflow
  • Make sure FEATURE_STANDALONE_GC is defined for the usual VM build #113347
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix missing ServiceCallSite.Key causing an unkeyed cache entry to be overwritten by a keyed instance #113343
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Clear diagnostic headers on request reuse #113342
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [android][coreclr] Fix lifetime of host_runtime_contract in template #113341
    area-Build-mono
  • [browser] profiler setup and env variables #113339
    arch-wasm, area-Diagnostics-mono, os-browser, 10.0.0
  • Reword HostAbortedException docs #113336
    area-Extensions-Hosting, 10.0.0
  • JIT: Remove `fgReorderBlocks` #113335
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0' => 'release/9.0-staging' #113333
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Remove `fgRelocateEHRegions` #113330
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #113328
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
  • JIT: Run switch peeling only once #113326
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Avoid dual "parameter" assignments #113324
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Swift ABI compatibility] Implement correct memory handling in C# bindings #2851
  • [Projection tooling] Review the design of projection tooling input: Implement ABI and MachO parser #2845

PullRequests

Merged

  • Add documents on the CoreCLR without runtime code generation experiment #2872
    area-CoreclrInterpreter
  • Add documents on the Mono interpreter analysis #2857
    area-CoreclrInterpreter

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Add support for Equality protocol #3031
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • PublishContainer + GeneratePackageOnBuild results in race #47429
  • [dotnet-watch] Watch restarts app without waiting for a file change when process terminates #47425
  • CLI: Add deprecation mechanism for aliases #47419
  • Net9 - dotnet watch opens the applicationUrl on every restart now #47410

Closed

  • `ExcludeAssets="compile"` has no effect on `ProjectReference`. #47403
  • 9.0.200 breaks "dotnet workload restore ..\some.sln" #47390
  • [APICompat] AssemblyLoadErrors should not be saved as CompatDifference #34064
    Backlog
  • Update vs-solutionpersistence to 1.0.52 #47297

PullRequests

Created

  • Reworked asset comparison #47428
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • make container app/entrypoint argument defaults only happen on the RID-specific builds, not the outer RID-less build #47424
    untriaged, Area-Containers
  • [REF] SolutionProjectModel Full Paths #47422
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Permit specifying to use workload versions in global.json #47421
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Update SDK-PR-guide.md to include inter-branch codeflow #47420
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47418
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create logger directory if it doesn't exist in dotnet test #47411
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged

Merged

  • Clean up extensions for dotnet CLI & Utils #47373
    untriaged, Area-CLI
  • Reapply "Fixup sourcelink information" (#47416) #47417
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #42861
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WorkloadRestoreCommand.DiscoverAllProjects: Return full paths #47415
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.4xx' => 'release/9.0.1xx' #47367
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.1xx' => 'release/9.0.2xx' #47341
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [9.0.3xx] Add analyzer redirecting VSIX #47021
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Revert "Fixup sourcelink information" #47416
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fixup sourcelink information #47363
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move BuildWithNetFrameworkHostedCompiler to common #47067
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update logic of mixed mode of dotnet test #47407
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet test improvements for MTP #47395
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'release/8.0.4xx' #47366
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.3xx' #47365
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Delete GetTestsProject task #47394
    untriaged

Updated

  • Harden metadata handler invoker against bad metadata #47433
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix MAUI static asset updates #47431
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Add basic support for 'dotnet run file.cs' #46915
    Area-run-file
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • [release/9.0.1xx] Avoid workload gc failure due to 4-part version in ReleaseVersion used to find a max #46989
    Servicing-approved, Area-Workloads, 9.0.4
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47400
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Generate the sdk msi bundles inside the VMR on windows BuildPass=2 verticals #47397
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet package list should not throw if project not specified #47402
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Run installer tests in pipeline #47313
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47388
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
